name: Galimulator
description: Galimulator is a galactic empire simulation and sandbox game. See how Empires rise and fall, and how the people in them climb through the ranks to bring prestige to their Dynasty. Then throw in an invasion of self replicating Smatter monsters if you want to spice things up.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Sound Card: Optional
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
